eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Zuo Le finally catches up to Jieyun, but is once again stopped by Huai Tianpei. Lin YÃ¼hsia begins to see the whole picture based on the available clues, and the reactions of others.

attributes.text: I was born by the River.
Dad told me that the River links the entire world. Build a good boat, and you can go anywhere.
Dad hated the snow. People can't go out when it snows, so 'business' stops and the whole family starves. That's how I got my name.

I didn't know what 'business' was, only that Dad would come home at the end of each month with a sword in one hand and stuff for the family in the other, including a present for me. Mom would sort the stuff and wash dad's bloody clothes without a word.
Then one day, a group of people wearing armor broke into the fort. Dad lived on the River all his life, and that's where he died.
I only remember the leader. He didn't look happy at the total victory he'd just won, he only gazed at the River dyed red with blood, lost in thought.
There was only one thought on my mind.
I wanted to take revenge.
I found out where he lived. I left home, going from the easternmost edge of Yan to the westernmost.
I learned that the land was more than just the River. There were mountains, streams, forests, plains.
People lived in many different ways, and dealt with many different hardships.
The river fort was too small. Dad might have chosen a different path if he had came out and seen all the land under Heaven.
Dad was wrong. There were only so many places you could go in a boat.
Finally, I came to Yumen. He stood atop the walls with that same expression. I began to understand.
I should take revenge.

attributes.content: That's about it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Huai has the sword. The kung fu lunatic is too much for Zuo Le to deal with.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: He waited three years just to fulfill the promise... interesting man.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How are Taihe's injuries?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: He's still unconscious.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The one who wounded Taihe was the same one who attacked Wei Yenwu. She got away in the chaos and was too fast for me to catch.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Zuo Le closed the Sword Forge. Many martial artists are... under observation.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Catastrophe lies before us, while the relationship between the military and jianghu has broken down. Yumen is only going to face even more chaos.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I could hardly reproach him for being impetuous.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You must take action yourself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: General Zuo entrusted the garrison to me. I can't very well openly defy him.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You know I'm not just talking about what happened these few days.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You'll be leaving soon. You must answer to those who looked up to you before you leave.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Or did you think you could dodge the questions that you cannot answer clearly?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: People think that you're my student. Sometimes even I forget where you came from and treat you like I would Zuo Le and the Record Keeper.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I've never called you 'master.'
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'm not your master.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You're a natural. Most of what you could do with a sword, you learned on your own. There was little I could teach you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You hid my identity from the others, allowing me to stay at Yumen.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I can't very well abandon a child to the barrens...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You never thought I would try to kill you? Or did you think I could never defeat you?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You didn't have to beat me, if you wanted revenge.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Just slip some poison into my food, or push me off the wall.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I worried that you wouldn't be able to let it go, even after killing me.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: ...I would have called you a hypocrite, if I hadn't hung around you for five years.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Five years. It's been that long?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Not so long from your point of view, is it?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Why would you say that?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Your appearance hasn't changed the slightest, and you still have that sad, depressed expression on your face, as though you've grown tired of seeing everything that happens in the world. The slowest burdenbeast would realize that you're no ordinary man.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I always thought the stories about long-lived races were a myth. Turns out there's one right next to me.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You knew.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I just never cared.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I wanted revenge. How long you could live didn't matter.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And thinking about you not being an ordinary mortal is just looking for excuses.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Like you said, climb the mountain one step at a time. All other thoughts are just distractions.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Can one truly let go of one's obsession with vengeance, one's obsession with victory and defeat, even when one's wish is fulfilled?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Distractions make your sword slow.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We mortals need our obsessions in order to keep living... you know that.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You weren't so forceful when we first met.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You taught me a lot these five years.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Only the basics of kung fu.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: As you said, you can only teach so much, but how much one learns is up to oneself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You should go and see those who remember you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Far too many have an obsession with you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The big man is gone...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Stop right there.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You again...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: If you're not in league with those criminals, why did you steal the sword? What is your connection to the man at the clinic?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't know them, and I don't know who he is.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You don't understand what kind of trouble you've gotten yourself in.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You've never lived in a nomadic city, and you know nothing about Yumen. Someone told you where the sword was and got you to steal it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But you don't understand what kind of trouble it would bring.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Tell me. Things may still be salvageable.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I told you, I'm not acting under anyone's instructions. I'm just repaying a debt.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Even if the price is your life?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Stop following me.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Whatever the truth is, I can't sit aside and let you put yourself in danger.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm trying to help you.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: All your words won't change anything. You're not a good person.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I'm under orders to investigate. You're the one who stole the sword. You may have your reasons, but that's no excuse for distorting the truth.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The man who arrested all the smiths at the forge can't be trusted.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: They tried to cover the Shanhaizhong's escape.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: They were there to protect it!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: All involved must be investigated until they are cleared of suspicion. We face the double threat of Catastrophe and criminals. I must abide by my duty to Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: My clan only makes weapons for strong and healthy Anasa who have reached the age of sixteen.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Those who receive a weapon swear to protect the young, the elderly, and the sick of the clan.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You say things about not letting me put myself in danger, about protecting a city, but you point your weapon at the common people.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: This is my duty...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Shifu was right. You people think that you're always right, just because of your lofty justifications.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I slowed down on purpose, only to find that no one was following.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You two started chatting while I still have the sword?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: There's been a misunderstanding, sir. I ask that you return the sword to its rightful master.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I heard you two arguing and more or less have an idea what's going on.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: This sword belonged to the Grandmaster, but this girl sneaked it out.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I'm sure he doesn't rely on any single weapon. Don't tell me he sent you after it because he missed it so much.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I'm afraid I'm not at liberty to say.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Causing trouble for him would delay his retirement even more... but I promised to help this girl here.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: What a headache.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Ah-ha.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I can't really be bothered with complicated questions, but I have a quick and simple solution.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Both of you have some kung fu. Why don't you two fight it out, here and now, and whoever wins gets the sword. No weapons, hand-to-hand only.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Ridiculous! How can something so important be determined so callously?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not fightingâ
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...I'm in a hurry.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Fist and foot as one in points of five; catch and parry, barrage to open.
Even within an inch there lies right and wrong; focus elsewhere only negates effort.
Oh?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The day has barely begun to break. The inn's workers wipe down the tables and prepare food for the day in the kitchen.
Lee rises to the call of fowlbeast in the backyardâand the sound of fists cutting through the air.
Like father, like daughter.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Nice.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uncle Lee...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's been a while since I've seen you practice this form. I thought maybe you had some sort of divine inspiration that helped you rise above forms and moves.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Don't tease me like that.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The only way to get better at martial arts is to practice. There are no magical secrets.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I remember how you got on the wrong side of a gang the first time you went out on an errand for the company.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When I arrived, all I saw was Triads lying unconscious on the ground, while you stood there like nothing had happened.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You were only sixteen...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I started learning kung fu before I learned to talk.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You remember?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: He told me...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: At least he taught you well in that regard.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Like they say, your teacher can show you the door, but you have be the one to walk through it.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Well, I suppose being shown the door is important too.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Maybe this was the only thing that he felt he could do as a father.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not trying to defend him. He wasn't a good father, but you shouldn't let that stop you from living the life that you want.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Consider your kung fu a gift. You can always tuck it away if you don't like it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Pursuit of kung fu mastery was his path, but it doesn't have to be yours.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I have nothing against kung fu, and of course I have my own life.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I graduated magna cum laude with a degree in mechanical engineering from the Lungmen University of Science and Technology. I'm an employee of Lee's Detective Agency, and field operator for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: But not the first hero of justice to graduate from LMUST.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I could be, if needed!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Then tell him the next time you see him.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uncle Lee, you...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You wouldn't just pick up a form that you haven't practiced for a long time for no reason.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Considering his irresponsible behavior all these years, it would be more than understandable if you wanted to pick a fight with him.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's okay if you lose. I doubt he was any better at your age.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.text: Zuo Le is young for a Candleholder, but he has seen his share of cases.
However, there has never been one where he could not fight back, nor has he ever been taught what to do in such a situation.
Does he have a guilty conscience? Or just not willing to take advantage of an injured girl?
All Zuo Le does is block the attacks as they fall on him.
They both fall to the ground, their faces covered in dirt, but the girl continues to strike with all that she has.
It looks like a fight between children.

attributes.content: (Shakes head and sighs)
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: The girl wins.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Catch.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Go and repay your debt, then come back and pay your medical bill.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Here's your sword, boy.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You didn't fight back because you knew she was hurt. No shame in that.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: No need to give me that look.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: The girl promised me she'll come back. I trust her.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: If she goes back on her word, I'll catch her for you.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You can go now.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Looks like you're unharmed.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Surprised? Or disappointed?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I didn't want anything to happen to you.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: There was a misunderstanding. Sorry to get you into trouble.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I've explained it to them. Everything is fine.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: A soldier told me that the armband, the one you gave me, was evidence retrieved from outside the city the day before.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Are you going to explain it to me or not?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Why should I, if you already know the story?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Du Yaoye's fist stops in midair. Lin YÃ¼hsia makes no motion to block or dodge.
We've only just met. I can understand if you don't trust me.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You wanted someone to help you check out the Sword Forge, that's fine.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: But you shouldn't have used my friend as a pretext.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You don't get to apologize to me. I won't forgive you.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Is this how Lungmenites do things?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: It's how I do things.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Well, I'm not going to come away empty-handed from this. What did you find?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Tell me everything you know.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I became certain of what I had only suspected.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Starting with the attack on the Messenger, something was off about everything we've seen.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: It wasn't a coincidence that you ran into the Shanhaizhong at the Sword Forge. It's proof that Meng was in league with them.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: So it was him?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: He is the only one with both the motivation and the means to plan all this.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I don't understand why he would do it...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: What else do you know about my friend's whereabouts?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Not much. I sent someone to look into it.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: In the worst case scenario, all of Yumen could be in great danger.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I hope this is not his goal, or that he has a plan...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.text: All these years, Meng Tieyi has rarely stood outside his workshop to gaze upon it.
Inside, the yard has always felt cramped. The walls and door look more impressive when one looks on them from outside.
There are only a few days left of the month-long market. The streets are busy as ever, making the lonely Sword Forge feel conspicuous in comparison.
The 'Closed' sign has fallen to the ground, replaced by red and white sealing tape.
A rivet has fallen from the door. He has never noticed, nor has anyone told him.

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Am I getting senile? I couldn't even get this one last thing done properly...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi
